title: Make a sankey plot — plot_sankey
Make a sankey plot — plot_sankey
code: plot_sankey(   data,   group_var,   capitalise_node_labels = TRUE,   save_png_to = NULL,   png_name = "sankey.png",   nodes_order_from_data = FALSE )

title: Make a sankey plot — plot_sankey
text: data data.frame. format output prep_sankey() contain columns: "middle_node", optionally "middle_node2", "is_aligned", "loan_size_outstanding", column implied group_var. group_var Character. Vector length 1. Variable group . capitalise_node_labels Logical. Flag indicating node labels converted better looking capitalised form. save_png_to Character. Path output png format saved png_name Character. File name output. nodes_order_from_data Logical. Flag indicating nodes order determined algorithm (case big datasets often results better looking plot) ordered based data.

title: Make a sankey plot — plot_sankey

title: Plot alignment scatterplot — plot_scatter
Plot alignment scatterplot — plot_scatter
code: plot_scatter(   data,   sector = NULL,   scenario_source = NULL,   scenario = NULL,   year = NULL,   region = NULL,   title = NULL,   subtitle = NULL,   alignment_limit = NULL,   data_level = c("company", "group_var"),   cap_outliers = NULL,   floor_outliers = NULL )

title: Plot alignment scatterplot — plot_scatter
text: data data.frame. format output prep_scatter() contain columns: 'name', 'buildout', phaseout', 'net'. sector Character. Sector name used plot title. scenario_source Character. Scenario source used plot caption. scenario Character. Scenario name used plot caption. year Integer. Year analysis used plot caption. region Character. Region used plot caption. title Character. Custom title different default. subtitle Character. Custom subtitle different default. alignment_limit Numeric. Limit applied x- y-axis scales alignment values colouring. default maximum absolute alignment value used. data_level Character. Level plotted data. Can 'group_var' 'company'. cap_outliers Numeric. Cap applied alignment values data. Values bigger cap plotted border plot. floor_outliers Numeric. Floor applied alignment values data. Values smaller floor plotted border plot.

title: Plot alignment scatterplot — plot_scatter
Plot alignment scatterplot — plot_scatter

title: Plot alignment scatterplot — plot_scatter_alignment_exposure
text: data data.frame. format output prep_scatter() contain columns: 'name', 'buildout', 'phaseout', 'net', column implied group_var. floor_outliers Numeric. Floor applied alignment values data. Values smaller floor plotted border plot. cap_outliers Numeric. Cap applied alignment values data. Values bigger cap plotted border plot. group_var Character. Character specifying variable contains groups analyse loan books. currency Character. Currency display plot labels.

text: data data.frame. format output prep_scatter_animated() contain columns: 'name', 'buildout', 'phaseout', 'net' 'year'. data_level Character. Level plotted data. Can 'group_var' 'company'. sector Character. Sector name used plot title. scenario_source Character. Scenario source used plot caption. scenario Character. Scenario name used plot caption. region Character. Region used plot caption. title Character. Custom title different default. subtitle Character. Custom subtitle different default. alignment_limit Numeric. Limit applied x- y-axis scales alignment values colouring. default maximum absolute alignment value data used. cap_outliers Numeric. Cap applied alignment values data. Values bigger cap plotted border plot. floor_outliers Numeric. Floor applied alignment values data. Values smaller floor plotted border plot.

title: Plot alignment timeline — plot_timeline
Plot alignment timeline — plot_timeline
code: plot_timeline(   data,   sector = NULL,   scenario_source = NULL,   scenario = NULL,   region = NULL,   group_var = NULL,   title = NULL,   subtitle = NULL,   alignment_limits = NULL )

title: Plot alignment timeline — plot_timeline
text: data data.frame format output prep_timeline() contain columns: 'direction', 'year', 'exposure_weighted_net_alignment', column implied group_var. sector Character. Sector name used plot title. scenario_source Character. Scenario source used plot caption. scenario Character. Scenario name used plot caption. region Character. Region used plot caption. group_var Character. Vector length 1. Variable group . title Character. Custom title different default. subtitle Character. Custom subtitle different default. alignment_limits Numeric vector size 2. Limits applied alignment values colouring. default maximum absolute value 'exposure_weighted_net_alignment' used.

what: Prepare data to plot using plot_sankey() — prep_sankey
title: Prepare data to plot using plot_sankey() — prep_sankey
Prepare data to plot using plot_sankey() — prep_sankey
code: prep_sankey(   data_alignment,   region,   year,   group_var,   middle_node,   middle_node2 = NULL )

title: Prepare data to plot using plot_sankey() — prep_sankey
text: data_alignment data.frame. Holds aggregated alignment metrics per company tms sectors. Must contain columns: "name_abcd", "sector" column implied group_var. region Character. Region filter data_alignment data frame . year Integer. Year data_alignment filtered. group_var Character. Vector length 1. Variable group . middle_node Character. Column specifying middle nodes plotted sankey plot. Must present data_alignment. middle_node2 Character. Column specifying middle nodes plotted sankey plot. Must present data_alignment.

what: Prepare data to plot scatterplot — prep_scatter
title: Prepare data to plot scatterplot — prep_scatter
Prepare data to plot scatterplot — prep_scatter
code: prep_scatter(   data_bopo,   data_net,   data_level = c("group_var", "company"),   year,   sector,   region,   group_var,   groups_to_plot = NULL )

title: Prepare data to plot scatterplot — prep_scatter
text: data_bopo data.frame. Data containing buildout phaseout alignment values. Must contain columns: 'year', 'sector', 'region', 'direction' either 'name_abcd' 'alignment_metric' 'exposure_weighted_net_alignment' plus column implied group_var. data_net data.frame. Data containing net alignment values. Must contain columns: group_var, 'year', 'sector', 'region', 'direction' either 'name_abcd' 'alignment_metric' 'exposure_weighted_net_alignment'. data_level Character. Level plotted data. Can 'group_var' 'company'. year Integer. Year data filtered. sector Character. Sector filter data . region Character. Region filter data . group_var Character. Vector length 1. Variable group . groups_to_plot Character vector. Groups filter .

code: prep_scatter_alignment_exposure(   data,   year,   region,   scenario,   group_var,   exclude_groups = "benchmark" )

title: Prepare data to plot using plot_scatter_alignment_exposure() — prep_scatter_alignment_exposure
text: data data.frame. Holds net aggregated alignment metrics loan book level. Must contain columns: "scenario", "region", "sector", "year", "exposure_weighted_net_alignment", "sum_loan_size_outstanding" column implied group_var. year Integer. Year data filtered. region Character. Region filter data data frame . scenario Character. Scenario filter data data frame . group_var Character. Vector length 1. column group . Must available variables data. exclude_groups Character. Character specifying values group_var included analysis. useful remove benchmarks meant compared level. Defaults "benchmark".
